title: 3 Bedroom apartment
posting_body: ['Available August.1st 2022', 'Approx.', '1200 sq.', 'ft. in a two-family house second floor, (with your own entrance and driveway)', 'Nice neighborhood, Less than 2 minutes’ walk to Walgreens, Stop & Shop, Dunkin Donuts,show case Cinema.', 'Beautiful Apartment with 2 off-street parking(your own driveway) and plenty street parking', 'Well insulated.(New siding, with Green buildings insulation, you will save money on heating)', 'Hardwood floor throughout.', 'Lots of windows, lots of sunshine, with nice view to the back-yard', 'Three bedrooms or Two bedrooms and an office, big living room, dining room, Eat in kitchen with', 'refrigerator, dishwasher and Lots of closet space', 'Utilities not included.', 'Easy access to route 60, 93, 1 and 1A;', 'short drive to Boston, and express bus to down town', 'Bring your own Washer/Dryer (its free for you no coins) and some Storage available in basement', 'Pets ( NO Dogs but Yes to Cats) , no smokers, no parties, please.', 'No information about lead paint', 'Please call or text me for showings (347-284-8400)......', 'No Emails please..Thanks!!!']
